about_the_game:
Embark on a delightful educational adventure with Times Tables Games, the ultimate learning multiplication companion for children and parents alike! Designed to make mastering multiplication tables not only easy but also lots of fun. With a variety of interactive features, Times Tables Games transforms the learning experience into an engaging memorization party.

Key Features:

  • Flashcards Fun: Flashcard game where you can select specific tables to focus on. Struggle with a particular card? No worries! The game smartly repeats the challenging cards until you can ace them with confidence.
  • Fishing: Cast your line in this enchanting fishing game. Earn coins, snag upgrades, and reel in bountiful catches by correctly answering multiplication questions. Collect various water creatures that you can proudly display while playing other games! It’s a splash of math and fun rolled into one!
  • Code Crackers: Challenge yourself with the Code Crackers Game, where solving times tables unlocks treats. The quicker and more accurate you are, the higher your score! Get more answers correct at the same time to double or triple your points. Can you beat the high score?
  • Study Haven: Explore the study screen with 144 buttons, to help you study times tables from 1-12. Tap and solve each multiplication question at your own pace.
  • Progress Tracker: Keep an eye on your mathematical journey with our Report Log. Watch your skills grow as you track your learning progress and celebrate every milestone achieved.

Perfect for young learners and supportive parents, Times Tables Games is tailored to assist students in mastering their multiplication tables, a fundamental skill crucial for academic success. Multiplication is no longer a chore—it’s a game!

name: Times Tables Games
short_description: Get ready to multiply the fun with Times Tables Games!
